---
name: New model request
about: Suggest a personality model to add to the atlas
title: 'Model request: '
labels: enhancement
assignees: ''
---

**Model name**
Full name and common abbreviation (e.g., "Revised NEO Personality Inventory (NEO-PI-R)").

**Citation**
Original publication reference.

**Category**
Which atlas category does it belong to?
- [ ] Trait-Based
- [ ] Clinical
- [ ] Narcissism-Based
- [ ] Motivational
- [ ] Cognitive
- [ ] Interpersonal
- [ ] Applied

**Number of factors**
How many factors/scales does the model have?

**Trait data available?**
Do you have trait descriptors formatted as Factor, Adjective, Synonym, Verb, Noun?

**Additional context**
Any other relevant information (e.g., how it differs from existing models in the atlas).
